en: Using the dictionary can ensure you not missing a single word .
baseline: 使用词典可以确保您没有错过单词。

en: Get used to using it yourself , and spread it to others .
baseline: 习惯用它自己,并把它传给别人。

en: If you 're really ambitious , set a goal of helping others become fluent in the language .
baseline: 如果你真有野心, 设法帮助别人掌握语言.

en: Remember you should know how to write it .
baseline: 记住,你应该知道怎么写。

en: It should make some sense , so that it will be easier to learn and speak with [ Example : Do n't use oh as e , hello as llo , and See ya as c yah ) .
baseline: 它应该有一点道理, 以便更容易学习和与人交谈. [ 例: 不要用“哦”来表示“e”, “你好”来表示“ló”, “见你”来表示“c yah”.
zh: 这应该有一点道理,这样就更容易学习和和他说话.[例:不要用“哦”,“你好”,“来吧”,“见吧”.

它应该是有意义的,这样就更容易学习和和他说:[例:不要用哦为e,你好为llo,和见你为cyah].

en: This will make grammar much easier to make .
baseline: 这将使语法变得更加容易。

en: Try this with a group of friends .
baseline: 与一群朋友一起尝试一下。

en: This makes your first language a proto-language — a language that branches off into a family of languages .
baseline: 这使得你的第一个语言成为一个原始语言 — — 语言分支成一个语言家族。

en: In addition , repelling and removing rodents from your home can be a hassle if you do n't know what you are doing .
baseline: 此外,如果你不知道你在做什么,那么从家里驱除和消灭啮齿动物可能是一个麻烦。
